entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
